TextView.android:text: Instructions-Click on the cards, an image will appear. Click on another card, if they both match, you get a pair. If they dont match, click on another card, the 2 already flipped cards will be turned automatically.Repeat this process till you find all the pairs. Click on the refresh option to restart the game. Click on the i button for instructions. Click on the 3 dots menu option for changing the size of the board, downloading custom games or making custom games.
